pageProduct.name: Avene Day Protector Tinted BB Cream SPF 30 40ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

BB Cream SPF30+++ for all sensitive skin types.

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Non comedogenic. For external use only. Avoid contact with the eyes.

Common Uses

Daily tinted care which provides protection against external aggressions, soothes and moisturizes the skin. The skin is soothed, comfortable, brightened, unified. Mineral photoprotection against UVA and UVB. SPF30+++. Suitable for most skin complexion. Fragrance-free, alcohol-free, paraben-free.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). DICAPRYLYL CARBONATE. COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE. C12-15 ALKYL BENZOATE. TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891). TITANIUM DIOXIDE [NANO]. GLYCERIN. ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE. NYLON-12. PEG-30 DIPOLYHYDROXYSTEARATE. DIMETHICONE. 

Directions

Apply in the morning onto face and neck after using Hydrance Optimale serum or Physiolift serum.
